query.name: gmt_create_begin
query.description: 单据创建开始时间建单时间范围(即end-begin)需要在90天内。{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss}

query.name: gmt_create_end
query.description: 单据创建结束时间建单时间范围(即end-begin)需要在90天内。{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss}

query.name: order_status
query.description: 单据状态 10:待打包; 20:待发货; 22:待收货; 25:已到仓; 40:已完成; -100610:超时关闭; -100:买家取消；不传则返回所有状态的采购单；

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/jit/purchase_order/query_list')
request.add_api_parameter("gmt_create_begin", "2023-10-01 00:00:00")
request.add_api_parameter("gmt_create_end", "2023-10-10 00:00:00")
request.add_api_parameter("purchase_order_no_list", "[\"POJ1001\",\"POJ1002\"]")
request.add_api_parameter("logistics_no_list", "[\"LBX1001\",\"LBX1002\"]}")
request.add_api_parameter("order_status", "10")
request.add_api_parameter("page_index", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("page_size", "20")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/jit/purchase_order/query_list')
request.add_api_param('gmt_create_begin', '2023-10-01 00:00:00')
request.add_api_param('gmt_create_end', '2023-10-10 00:00:00')
request.add_api_param('purchase_order_no_list', '[\"POJ1001\",\"POJ1002\"]')
request.add_api_param('logistics_no_list', '[\"LBX1001\",\"LBX1002\"]}')
request.add_api_param('order_status', '10')
request.add_api_param('page_index', '1')
request.add_api_param('page_size', '20')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
